trans-unit.source: Provides a strongly typed collection for <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"></xref> objects and implements the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable"></xref> interface to support navigating through the collection.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma coleção com tipo seguro para <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"> </xref> objetos e implementa o <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable"> </xref> interface para suportar a navegar na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The SiteMapNodeCollection class provides a strongly typed collection for <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects.
trans-unit.target: A classe de SiteMapNodeCollection fornece uma coleção com tipo seguro para <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>objetos.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>

trans-unit.source: It stores <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects internally in a zero-based array.
trans-unit.target: Armazena <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>objetos internamente uma matriz baseada em zero.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>

trans-unit.source: You can modify a SiteMapNodeCollection collection when it is first created, and then use the following methods to add, copy, and remove <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects: - To add <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects, use the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.AddRange%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Insert%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Pode modificar uma coleção de SiteMapNodeCollection quando é criado pela primeira vez e, em seguida, utilize os seguintes métodos para adicionar, copiar e remover <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>objetos: - para adicionar <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>objetos, utilize o <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.AddRange%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Insert%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>

trans-unit.source: - To copy <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects, use the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.CopyTo%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -Para copiar <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>objetos, utilize o <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.CopyTo%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.CopyTo%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>

trans-unit.source: - To remove <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects, use the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -Para remover <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>objetos, utilize o <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Remove%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>

trans-unit.source: You can create a read-only SiteMapNodeCollection, which does not permit adding, copying, nor removing <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects, by using the static <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.ReadOnly%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Pode criar um SiteMapNodeCollection só de leitura, que não permite adicionar, copiar, nem remover <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>objetos, utilizando a estática <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.ReadOnly%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.ReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>

trans-unit.source: The SiteMapNodeCollection collections that are returned by the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.GetAllNodes%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.GetChildren%2A> methods are read-only, as is the SiteMapNodeCollection that is returned when the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.ChildNodes%2A> property is accessed on a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object that is returned from a provider.
trans-unit.target: As coleções de SiteMapNodeCollection que são devolvidas pelo <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.GetAllNodes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.GetChildren%2A>métodos são só de leitura, como é SiteMapNodeCollection que é devolvido quando a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.ChildNodes%2A>é aceder à propriedade num <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>objeto é devolvido a partir de um fornecedor.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.ChildNodes%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.GetChildren%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.GetAllNodes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception is thrown, if you attempt to modify a read-only SiteMapNodeCollection by setting the default indexer property or by using any of the following methods: - <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add%2A> - <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.AddRange%2A> - <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Clear%2A> - <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Insert%2A> - <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Remove%2A> - <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.RemoveAt%2A> Use the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.IsReadOnly%2A> property to check the collection before calling any of the methods in the preceding list.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.NotSupportedException>exceção é emitida, se tentar modificar uma SiteMapNodeCollection só de leitura, definindo a propriedade de indexador predefinida ou utilizando qualquer um dos seguintes métodos:- <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add%2A>- <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.AddRange%2A>- <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Clear%2A>- <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Insert%2A>- <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Remove%2A>- <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.RemoveAt%2A>Utilize o <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.IsReadOnly%2A>propriedade para verificar a coleção antes de chamar qualquer um dos métodos na lista anterior.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.IsReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.RemoveAt%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Clear%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection"> </xref> classe, que é a instância predefinida.

trans-unit.source: The array that is passed to the AddRange method can contain `null` values; however, this leads to unexpected exceptions when the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> collection is manipulated.

trans-unit.source: Copies the entire collection to a compatible one-dimensional array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Copia o conjunto completo para uma matriz unidimensional compatível, que começa no índice especificado da matriz de destino.

trans-unit.source: The CopyTo method delegates to the <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.List%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, which accounts for the possible exceptions that are listed in "Exceptions."
trans-unit.target: Os delegados de método CopyTo para a <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.List%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade, o qual das contas para as possíveis exceções que estão listadas em "Exceções".</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.List%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional array that must have zero-based indexing and is the destination of the elements copied from the <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A matriz unidimensional tem de ter a indexação com base em zero e é o destino dos elementos copiada a partir de <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `array` at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero `array` em que copiar começa.

trans-unit.source: array is .
trans-unit.target: arrayis .

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: indexé menor que zero.

trans-unit.source: array is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: arrayé multidimensional.

trans-unit.source: -or- The number of objects in the source is greater than the available space from index to the end of array.
trans-unit.target: - ou - o número de objetos na origem de é superior ao espaço disponível desde o index ao fim do array.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of elements contained in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de elementos contidos na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto que pode ser utilizado para sincronizar o acesso à coleção.

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: Enumerar através de um <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>coleção intrinsecamente não é um procedimento de segurança de thread.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: Even when a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> is synchronized, other threads can still modify the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Mesmo quando um <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>está sincronizado, outros threads ainda podem modificar o <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>, que faz com que o enumerador acionar uma excepção.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes that are made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: Para garantir a segurança de thread durante a enumeração, pode obter o bloqueio de <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>durante a enumeração de toda ou detetar exceções resultantes das alterações efetuadas por outros threads.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>

trans-unit.target: Um objeto que pode ser utilizado para sincronizar acesso para o <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Insere um item na coleção no <xref:System.Collections.IList>interface no índice especificado.</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based `index` at which to insert `value`.
trans-unit.target: O baseado em zero `index` no qual pretende inserir `value`.

trans-unit.source: The object to insert into the <xref:System.Collections.IList>.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a inserir <xref:System.Collections.IList>.</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.target: O elemento no índice especificado.
